name: 王柄雄
objective: This course is aimed at equipping students with fundamental knowledge about structural analysis for beams, frames, and trusses. This semester will focus on the analysis of statically determinate structures about their reactive forces, internal loadings, deflections, and influence lines. Energy methods for determining the structural deflections will also be presented in the course.
schedule:
W01: Types of structures and loads
W02: Basic analysis of statically determinate structures
W03-04: Statically determinate trusses 
W05-06: Internal loadings developed in structural members
W07-08: Influence lines of statically determinate structures
W09: Midterm
W10: Elastic beam theory
W11: Double integration method
W12: Conjugate-beam method
W13-16: Deflections using energy methods
W17: Review of statically determinate structural deflections  
W18: Final examination
scorePolicy:
Attendance & Homework & Quiz: 20% 
Midterm: 40% 
Final Exam.: 40%
materials: R. C. Hibbeler (2020). Structural Analysis 10ed. ISBN: 978-1-292-24713-7(http://www.gaulih.com.tw/tier/front/bin/ptdetail.phtml?Part=VX0417&Category=0)
consultation: phwang@ntut.edu.tw 星期一 (Monday)　10:00 ~ 12:00 星期五 (Friday)      10:00 ~ 12:00
